title: AE插件-抽象三维图形循环动画生成插件 Aura v1.2.3 Win
author: 大众脸
content: Aura 是一款专为 After Effects 设计的程序化插件，可在 3D 空间中生成优雅的几何形状。它不同于传统的粒子系统，不渲染大量分散的小粒子，而是通过随时间变化的矢量形状（如波浪）来实现动画效果，类似经典插件 Radiowaves。该插件可高效渲染数十万条高频波形，创造出令人着迷的视觉动态。

additional_info.description_en: Aura is a procedural plug-in for After Effects that creates elegant geometric shapes in 3D space. It’s akin to a particle system but instead of rendering small particles all over the place, it generates vector like shapes (waves) that change over time much like the classic Radiowaves plug-in. It renders hundreds of thousands of high-frequency waves without sweat and creates mesmerizing animations.
